subfields.name: fsType
subfields.label: Filesystem Type
subfields.helptext: The type of the filesystem, eg: 'ext4', 'xfs', 'ntfs'

subfields.name: gateway
subfields.label: Gateway
subfields.helptext: The host address of the ScaleIO API Gateway.

subfields.name: projectionDomain
subfields.label: Projection Domain
subfields.helptext: The name of the ScaleIO Protection Domain for the configured storage.

subfields.name: secretRef
subfields.label: Secret Reference
subfields.helptext: SecretRef references to the secret for ScaleIO user and other sensitive information. If this is not provided, Login operation will fail.

subfields.name: name
subfields.label: Name of secret
subfields.helptext: The name of the kubernetes secret.

subfields.name: sslEnabled
subfields.label: Enable SSL
subfields.helptext: Flag to enable/disable SSL communication with Gateway, default false.

subfields.name: storageMode
subfields.label: Storage Mode
subfields.helptext: Indicates whether the storage for a volume should be ThickProvisioned or ThinProvisioned. Default is ThinProvisioned.

subfields.name: storagePool
subfields.label: Storage Pool Name
subfields.helptext: The ScaleIO Storage Pool associated with the protection domain.

subfields.name: system
subfields.label: System
subfields.helptext: The name of the storage system as configured in ScaleIO.

subfields.name: volumeName
subfields.label: Volume Name
subfields.helptext: The name of a volume already created in the ScaleIO system that is associated with this volume source.

subfields.name: readOnly
subfields.label: Read Only
subfields.helptext: Enabling it will force the ReadOnly property in VolumeMounts.
